titleStmt.title: A Description of Mother Ludwell's Cave.

publicationStmt.p: Distributed by Digital Scholarship Services at Lafayette College

lg.l: “ha Catabrae dulces et si mihi credis amaena.”

R074$1L3 1 “Let others with Parnassus swell their theme, R074$1L3 2 Drink inspiration from the AEgean stream,R074$1L3 3 Let them draw Phoebus down to patch a line,R074$1L3 4 Invoke that hackney fry the tuneful nine.R074$1L3 5 I that of Ludwell sing, to Ludwell run,R074$1L3 6 Herself my muse, her spring my helicon.R074$1L3 7 The neighbouring Park its friendly aid allows,R074$1L3 8 Perfum'd with thyme, o'erspread with shadie boughs.R074$1L3 9 Its heavy canopies new thoughts instill,R074$1L3 10 And Crookesbury supplies the cloven hill;R074$1L3 11 Pomona does Minerva's stores dispense,R074$1L3 12 And Flora sheds her balmie influence.R074$1L3 13 All things conspire to press my modest muse:R074$1L3 14 The morning herbs adorn's with pearly dews,R074$1L3 15 The meadows interlaced with silver flouds,R074$1L3 16 The frizled thickets, and the taller woods,R074$1L3 17 The whispering Zephrs, my more silent tongueR074$1L3 18 Correct, and Philomela chirps a song.R074$1L3 19 Is there a bird of all the blooming yearR074$1L3 20 That has not sung his early mattins here?R074$1L3 21 That has not sipped the Fairy Matron's spring,R074$1L3 22 Or hover'd o'er her cave with wishful ring.R074$1L3 23 An awful fabric, built by nature's hand,R074$1L3 24 Does rise our wonder our respects command.R074$1L3 25 Three lucky trees to wilder art unknownR074$1L3 26 Seem on the front a growing triple crown.R074$1L3 27 At first the arched room is high and wide,R074$1L3 28 The naked wall with mossie hangings hid,R074$1L3 29 The ceiling sandy; as you forward pressR074$1L3 30 The roof is still declining into less.R074$1L3 31 Despair to reach the end, a little arch,R074$1L3 32 Narrow and low, forbids your utmost search;R074$1L3 33 So to her lover the chaste beauteous lassR074$1L3 34 Without a blush vouchsafes to show her face,R074$1L3 35 Her neck of ivory, her snowy breast──R074$1L3 36 These shown she modestly conceals the rest.R074$1L3 37 A shallow brook, that restless undergroundR074$1L3 38 Struggled with earth, here a moist passage found.R074$1L3 39 Down through a stoney vein the waters rowl,R074$1L3 40 O'er flowing the capacious iron bowl.R074$1L3 41 Oh! happy bowl that gladness can infuseR074$1L3 42 And yet was new stained with heavy juice.R074$1L3 43 Here thirsty souls carouse with innocence,R074$1L3 44 Nor owe their pleasure to their loss of sense.R074$1L3 45 Here a smooth floor had many a figure shewnR074$1L3 46 Had virgin footsteps made impression,R074$1L3 47 That soft and swift Camilla-like advanceR074$1L3 48 While even movements seem to fly a dance.R074$1L3 49 No quilted couch the sick man's daily bed,R074$1L3 50 No seats to lull asleep diseases madeR074$1L3 51 Are seen, but such as healthy persons pleaseR074$1L3 52 Of wood or stone, such as the wearied ease.R074$1L3 53 Oh! might I still enjoy this peaceful gloom!R074$1L3 54 The truest entrance to Elysium.R074$1L3 55 Who would to the Crimeen den repair,R074$1L3 56 A better Sybil, wiser power is here.R074$1L3 57 Methinks I see him from his Palace come,R074$1L3 58 And with his presence grace ye baleful roR074$1L3 59 Consider Ludwell what to him you owe,R074$1L3 60 Who does for you the noisey court forego.R074$1L3 61 Nay he a rich and gaudy silence leaves,R074$1L3 62 You share ye honour sweet Mooreparke receives.R074$1L3 63 You with yr wrinkles admiration moveR074$1L3 64 That with its beauty better merite love.R074$1L3 65 Here's careless nature is her ancient dress,R074$1L3 66 There she's most modish, and consults ye glass.R074$1L3 67 Here she's an old and yet a pleasant dame,R074$1L3 68 There she a fair not painted Virgin seem.R074$1L3 69 Here the rich mettal has through fire pass'dR074$1L3 70 There the refin'd by no alloy debas'd.R074$1L3 71 Thus nature is preserved in every part,R074$1L3 72 Sometimes adorn'd but not debauch'd by art,R074$1L3 73 Where scatter'd locks that dangle on the browR074$1L3 74 Into more decent haire circles grow.R074$1L3 75 After enquiry made though no man loveR074$1L3 76 The curling iron, all the comb approve.”R074$1L3
